#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#define in_t(t) scanf("%d",&t)
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int  with;
    double bal;
    scanf("%d",&with);
    scanf("%lf",&bal);
    if(with>bal)
    printf("%.2lf\n",bal);
    else if(with==bal)
    printf("%.2lf\n",bal);
    else if (with%5==0)
    printf("%.2lf\n",bal-with-0.50);
    else if(with%5)
    printf("%.2lf\n",bal);
    return 0;
}
